<TipAccountApproaches />

An [`Account`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md) is always initialised with a default
[`Address`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Address.md). However, depending on you approach, your application may handle
many addresses. The IOTA SDK provides a convenient function to list all the `Addresses` related to an `Account`:
[`account.addresses()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#addresses).

This function will retrieve accurate and up-to-date information such as the address balance,
transaction history, and other relevant metadata, facilitating seamless management of multiple users within your
platform.

## Example Code

<Tabs groupId="language" queryString>
<TabItem value="rust" label="Rust">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](./create-account.mdx).
2. Get all the [`AccountAddress`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/types/struct.AccountAddress.html)
   related to the `Account` by calling the [`Account.addresses()`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/account/struct.AccountInner.html#method.addresses)
   function.

<div className={'hide-code-block-extras'}>

```rust reference
https://github.com/iotaledger/iota-sdk/blob/develop/sdk/examples/how_tos/accounts_and_addresses/list_addresses.rs#L22-L26
```

</div>

</TabItem>
<TabItem value="typescript-node" label="Typescript (Node.js)">

1. Instantiate a [`Wallet`](https://docs.rs/iota-sdk/latest/iota_sdk/wallet/core/struct.Wallet.html) and get Alice's `Account` which was
   [created in the first guide](./create-account.mdx).
2. Get all the [`Addresses`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Address.md)
   related to the `Account` by calling the [`Account.addresses()`](../../references/nodejs/classes/Account.md#addresses)
   function.
